squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx

Class Filter<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color>

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.Filter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    squidpony.IFilter<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Filters.ColorizeFilter, Filters.GammaCorrectFilter, Filters.HallucinateFilter, Filters.LerpFilter, Filters.MaxValueFilter, Filters.MultiLerpFilter, Filters.PaletteFilter, Filters.SaturationFilter, Filters.WiggleFilter

    public abstract class Filter<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color>
extends Object
implements squidpony.IFilter<T>
    An abstract class that handles changes between a given color component and an actual one, and may carry state as a float array. Created by Tommy Ettinger on 10/31/2015.
